unnormalised: ## Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hitting Indian Roads!
normalised: ## Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hitting Indian Roads!

unnormalised: Hey petrolheads! The Indian automotive scene is heating up faster than a samosa in July! We've got launches galore happening all over, from Mumbai to Madras.
normalised: Hey petrolheads! The Indian automotive scene is heating up faster than a samosa in July! We've got launches galore happening all over, from Mumbai to Madras.

unnormalised: First up, Mahindra’s rumoured to be unleashing their new Thar variant next month. Spotted testing near Pune, this bad boy is expected to be packing some serious off-roading punch. They're probably aiming it squarely at the Gypsy lovers!
normalised: First up, Mahindra's rumoured to be unleashing their new Thar variant next month. Spotted testing near Pune, this bad boy is expected to be packing some serious off-roading punch. They're probably aiming it squarely at the Gypsy lovers!

unnormalised: Then there’s Tata Motors, teasing a new Nexon facelift with a completely revamped interior. Leaked images show a massive infotainment screen and a panoramic sunroof – talk about pimpin’ your ride! Sources say Dr. Sen at ARAI has already given it the thumbs up.
normalised: Then there's Tata Motors, teasing a new Nexon facelift with a completely revamped interior. Leaked images show a massive infotainment screen and a panoramic sunroof – talk about pimping your ride! Sources say Doctor Sen at A R A I has already given it the thumbs up.

unnormalised: Rumours also whisper about Maruti Suzuki finally launching their Jimny 5-door. Finally! Should give a tough fight to the Gurkha. Expect a starting price around Rs. 12 Lakh.
normalised: Rumours also whisper about Maruti Suzuki finally launching their Jimny five door. Finally! Should give a tough fight to the Gurkha. Expect a starting price around rupee twelve lakh.

unnormalised: Also, remember that electric scooter from Ather? Word is they're expanding their charging network. New stations are popping up faster than panipuri stalls – including a massive one boasting 10,000 sq ft in Bangalore! Talk about range anxiety solved! Keep your eyes peeled and wallets ready folks! We are in for a treat! Drive safe!
normalised: Also, remember that electric scooter from Ather? Word is they're expanding their charging network. New stations are popping up faster than panipuri stalls – including a massive one boasting ten thousand square feet in Bangalore! Talk about range anxiety solved!
